data.name: Break Free
data.detailed_description:
Break Free features fast paced monster shooting action designed to constantly keep you at the edge of your seat, faced with hordes enemies and powerful bosses, you must use every tool in your arsenal to defeat the enemy and ensure the survival of the human race.

Please consider reporting bugs before posting a review, some issues are very easily overlooked and very easily fixed. Though it isn't listed in the early access section, this is an early first iteration of the game that is mainly concentrated on gameplay, In-fact it could almost be considered a proof concept.

Players can expect:
Fast paced adrenaline pumping monster shooting action.
Character customization.
Multiple weapons and armor.
Weapon Upgrades
Drivable vehicles.
Appealing visuals.
and more

Post launch updates will include new missions, weapons, armor, vehicles, gameplay features and a richer lore etc.

data.short_description: Break Free is a fast paced third person sci fi shooter game. The creatures that live among us have made the Earth uninhabitable for human life. You are mankind's best hope for survival. Make no mistake, war is coming and you shall die today, then you shall live to fight again tomorrow.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 @ 3.3 GHz or better, or AMD Ryzen 3 @ 3.1 GHz or better
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1050Ti (4GB), GTX 1060 (3GB), GTX 1650 (4GB) or AMD Radeon R9 280(3GB), AMD Radeon R9 290 (4GB), RX 470 (4GB)
  • Storage: 10 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 64-bit Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-6700K or better, or AMD Ryzen 7 1800X or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060 6GB / GTX 1660 Super or Radeon RX 590
  • Storage: 10 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
